cv_page.about_me_description: I am an experienced Web Developer specializing in Front-End programming and UX/UI design. With 15 years of experience in family business, I have developed strong entrepreneurial and problem-solving skills. I gained knowledge at ISM, completed Front-End studies at Bit Academy, and am currently continuing my studies at www.codecademy.com. I am outgoing, positive, and a determined "fighter", constantly striving for perfection and innovation.
cv_page.manager_responsibilities_2: E-shop IT maintenance, administration, company website SEO optimization.
cv_page.manager_responsibilities_3: Sales planning and company strategy development.
cv_page.manager_responsibilities_4: Primary financial accounting, cash register work, assistance to accountant.
cv_page.manager_responsibilities_5: Goods delivery to wholesalers and warehouse maintenance.
cv_page.manager_skills: organizational, managerial, communication, planning, negotiation, financial accounting, conflict resolution.
cv_page.consultant_responsibilities_1: Professional customer consultation and technical support by phone in IT field.
cv_page.consultant_skills: teamwork, problem solving, information search, communication.
